title: Cryptoworldman
author: Cryptoworldman
created_time: May 21, 2023, 01:59:58 PMLast edit: May 23, 2023, 03:37:24 AM by Cryptoworldman
content: Website  ★ docs   ★Twitter  ★Instagram  ★Telegram  ★discord   ★General Rules★All Participants Must join pepverse.io all Social Media And (Bounty Group )  ★Once rejected he will not be accepted again Participants cannot change their wallet address after registration, Must be double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign★Talking About The Bounty in The Project Chat Group Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign And An Instant Ban From The Company Chat Group.★Please Ask Your Bounty related Questions in the Crypto World bounty Group,★Please Note That Any Offensive or inappropriate Behavour Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign *Using Multiple Accounts, Cheating And Spanning Are Not Allowed★KYC not necessary for this campaign All Participants Must Send The Proof of Authentication Post To Join The Bounty ProgramTwitter's 40%Telegrams 20%Instagram 10%Video 20%Reserve 10%Limited : Twitter : 400Telegram : 250Instagram : 200Video : 60                                   Total =2 Week  Week 1 : 21/5/23 - 27/5/23Week 2 : 28/5/23 - 03/6/23Rules:★Must follow the (Pepverse.io) official twitter page.★Must post 3 original tweet about (pepverse.io) using the hashtags: #PEPEARMY #PEPE #pepecoin #PEPEBNB #PepVerse★Must retweet and like 3 Firsted tweets by (pepverse.io every week.★Must comment constructively when you retweet content as well.★Must have at least 500 real followers (Best 90% in Twitter Audit)★Followers count will be fixed from your registration.★Minimum of 3 original tweets and 3 retweets with 2 comments on content and should be posted within the whole week not just in a dayRewards500-1000 followers - 1 stakes1001-3000 folowers 2 stakes3001 5000 flowers- 3 stakes 5001 - 10000 followers- 5 stakes10000+ followers 7 stakes                       Join Now  Rules :★Every participant must join the  Bounty Group.★Update your telegram name to your name | Pepverse.io & avater ( Example: Cryptoworld | pepverse.io)★Write min 5 constructive messages in other crypto related telelgram group★ Write in pepverse.io Main Telegram 5 constructive message★Spam post deleted messages will not be counted★You must stay in the telegram group until The end of The campaign.★ Reward ★ ★10 stakes for 10 constructive post per week.If you used Avatar + Name = You will get 5 stake when campaign is finished)             Join Now Rules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow pepverse.io Instagram account: (Link)3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 5 posts per week (3 posts, 2 reposts).5. Use these hashtags; Use these hashtags: #PEPEARMY #PEPE #pepecoin #PEPEBNB #PepVerseRewards:300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per week            Join Now Rules: ★Video need to be min of 3 minutes & must have at least 100 subscribers video contents must focus on project features, token sale, blockchain, NFT, etc★ Video must be English others local Language is not accepted ★Videos need to have a link to the btt username poa post & project website.★Each participant can sand 2 video only ( Youtube & Tiktok) RewardsAverage quality -2 StakeGood quality - 4 StakeHigh quality - 6 StakeExcellent quality: 8 Stake          Join Now
